BOT:
Hi there!
I'm SmoochMediaBot. Here to help you craft a killer story.
![SmoochBot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmoochMediaBot/SmoochMediaBot/master/img/botImage-01.png)
Here's how this works: simply respond to my questions, backtap or say HUMAN at any time.
What would you like to write about? %[Smooch](postback:smooch) %[Build Your Own Bot](postback:build_bot) %[Consumer Survey](postback:consumer_survey)
HELLO: Hey, I'm so glad you set EstherBot up! Do you want to tell Esther that you're talking to her bot? %[Tell her](postback:twitter)
TELL HER: Let's tweet @ Esther so she knows you're setting a bot up. Here's a tweet that's ready to go: %[Tweet Esther](http://bit.ly/estherbot-tweet)
I LOVE YOU: Awh, shucks! I love you too!
SMOOCH:
Cool. I’m always happy to chat about Smooch!
We simplify messaging so businesses can create better customer experiences.
We do this with easy interfaces, beautiful API + SDKs and rich messaging capabilities.
Check out our out-of-the-box messaging channels!
![Plumbing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmoochMediaBot/SmoochMediaBot/master/img/Plumbing.png)
Click on the image to zoom if it's too tiny.
What would you like to learn next? %[Funding](postback:FUNDING) %[Traction](postback:traction) %[Team](postback:team)

NO:
A family of entrepreneurs, Hammie, Hamnett and August Hill founded ZeroKnowledge (now Radialpoint) and sold to AppDirect last year.
Today, the Hills are invested in industries such as sustainable foods, bitcoin, and communications. Hamnett is rocking the CEO role at Smooch.

MIKE GOZZO:
This is Mike giving a talk at ProductTank
![Mike](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmoochMediaBot/SmoochMediaBot/master/img/Mike%20Gozzo.png)
Mike is a trained electrical engineer and MBA. He built and sold Appifier in 2014 before spearheading Smooch.
He also loves to run and cook. Been named one of Quebec's top 25 emerging entrepreneurs.

HAMNETT HILL:
Hamnett is an IT communications veteran and entrepreneur. He founded, lead and sold TotalNet and Zero Knowledge (now Radial Point). Asides from leading Smooch, Hamnett runs a private equity fund focused in sustain foods.

BUILD_BOT:
Botastic! Bots are a great way for you to qualify your pitch flow.
I’ve opened this bot template here. Just follow the simple instructions [insert bit.ly link] to copy it, customize the script and promote it.
 No more pitches by email!
Pro Tip: Give yourself a few hours to write and test your script.
CONSUMER_SURVEY:
Nice pick! We asked 450 US consumers how they felt about messaging businesses.
Guess how many said they WANT to message businesses?%[30%](postback:30) %[60%](postback:60) %[90%](postback:90)
30:
Close! It’s actually 60% of people WANT to message businesses. Interestingly, only 35% actually have in the past.
Do you think consumers are willing to pay for products/services over messaging?
50% would! And 7 out of 10 would store their favorite brand’s contact info in their phone.
What’s the next statistic you’d like to see?
%[Top Messaging Apps](postback:mess_apps) %[Messaging Reasons](postback:mess_reasons) %[Download All](postback:download_all)
